description:
Facebook Live Stream is a brand new free Facebook feature that lets you stream live video with the smartphone in your hand. This new live streaming broadcast feature was just released January of 2016 and is being added to everyone's personal FB time line.

Take a peek at this new Facebook feature for yourself and how to access it with your smartphone with the Free Preview of Lecture 2

If you want to start using this FREE HANDHELD MARKETING MACHINE then you need this course. Learn every aspect of Facebook Live Streaming as I give you the step-by-step video walk through to expose your brand, expand your business and exceed your marketing goals for 2016.

Yes, Facebook Live Streaming is easy peasy to use ... After all, it is still Facebook with a face lift. This is the easiest live streaming platform available online for everyone that has ever seen a social media site.

This course is a no fluff, no hype video walk through of Facebook Live Stream. And I even show you how to use it. You will be schmoozing with your target market right in their time line on day one in real time.
title: Facebook Live Streaming for Marketers
